One Dark Night

Ano: 1982

IMDb ID: tt0086050

Classificação: 5.6

Sinopse: The seventy year-old Russian physicist Karl "Raymar" Raymarseivich is found dead in his apartment with six girls in a bizarre crime scene. His estranged daughter Olivia and her husband Allan attend the funeral and the corpse goes to the mausoleum. Meanwhile, the outcast Julie wants to join the sisterhood of Carol and her sisters Kitty and Leslie. Her boyfriend Steve, who was Carol's former boyfriend, advises Julie to give up, but she is determined to join. Carol decides that Julie shall spend the night in the mausoleum in her initiation to join the sisterhood, but she is jealous and intends to play pranks on Julie along the night. Out of the blue, the journalist Dockstader visits Olivia and tells that he was a friend of her father. He also tells that he was powerful in telekinesis, using the life force of the fear of hitchhiker girls that he used to bring to his apartment, and he leaves an audio tape to Olivia and asks her to listen later. What will happen to Julie, locked in the mausoleum?—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
